content.rendered:
EVENT COORDINATOR

Lindsey grew up in Warner Robins, Georgia, but moved to Nashville from Dayton, Ohio. She discovered her passion for event planning in 2017 when a friend randomly asked Lindsey to coordinate her wedding. She quickly jumped at the opportunity and said “YES!” After that, Lindsey knew this is what she wanted to pursue full-time.

When she moved to Ohio, Lindsey began working with a local wedding planner to learn more about the industry. She planned and coordinated weddings in Dayton, Cincinnati, and Columbus. She has been in the industry for 6 years now and has worked at some pretty fun venues. One of the most memorable was a wedding at the Bengals Stadium!

Lindsey loves living in Nashville and is so excited to join the Infinity Hospitality team! When not running an event, she enjoys going to new coffee shops, seeing shows, and going on a hike with her husband and two huskies.
